document.full_text: holder phil mickelson has ordered up a spanish feast for the masters champions dinner to honor twice-winner seve ballesteros, who is unable to travel to augusta because of a brain tumor.
document.title: masters-mickelson's augusta dinner a tribute to ballesteros
lines_and_colors: holder phil mickelson has ordered up a spanish feast for the masters champions dinner to honor twice-winner seve ballesteros, who is unable to travel to augusta because of a brain tumor.
